items.title: iOS 18.6 和 macOS Sequoia 15.6 修复 Chrome 零日攻击 (原标题: iOS 18.6 and macOS Sequoia 15.6 Address Chrome Zero-Day Attack)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 18.6 和 macOS Sequoia 15.6 修复 Chrome 零日攻击

Apple 近日发布了 iOS 18.6、iPadOS 18.6 和 macOS Sequoia 15.6 更新，主要目的是解决一个针对 Chrome 用户的严重零日攻击漏洞。

## 零日漏洞详情 (CVE-2025-6558)

*   **漏洞类型**: 根据 Bleeping Computer 报道，该漏洞（CVE-2025-6558）是一个存在于开源代码中的缺陷，同时也影响了 Apple 的软件。
*   **潜在影响**: 攻击者可以利用特制的 HTML 页面执行任意代码，从而绕过 Chrome 的沙箱保护机制。
*   **利用情况**: Google 已于 7 月 15 日修复了此问题，并确认该漏洞已被积极利用。
*   **对 Safari 的影响**: Apple 表示，该问题可能导致 Safari 浏览器意外崩溃，但目前尚未发现针对 Safari 用户的攻击利用。
*   **信息限制**: Google 尚未公布该漏洞的技术细节，并表示在大多数用户更新其设备之前，将限制额外信息的披露。
*   **用户建议**: 建议 Chrome 用户尽快安装最新版本以确保安全。

![Chrome Feature 22](https://images.macrumors.com/t/KVYbvdxKS_Vs6jKdHNIqkP0b9N8=/400x0/article-new/2022/06/Chrome-Feature-22.jpg?lossy)

## 其他近期 Apple 软件更新

*   **watchOS 11.6**: Apple 于 2025 年 7 月 29 日发布了 watchOS 11.6，这是 Apple Watch 操作系统的第六次更新，兼容 Apple Watch Series 6 及更高版本、所有 Apple Watch Ultra 型号和 Apple Watch SE 2。
*   **macOS Sequoia 15.6**: 同日，Apple 发布了 macOS Sequoia 15.6，这是 macOS Sequoia 操作系统的第六个主要更新，可免费供所有支持 macOS 15 的 Mac 设备下载。
*   **iOS 18.6 和 iPadOS 18.6**: Apple 也在 2025 年 7 月 29 日发布了 iOS 18.6 和 iPadOS 18.6，这些更新主要修复了一个与照片相关的错误。

## iPhone 17 系列传闻

文章还提到了关于 iPhone 17 系列的一些传闻：

*   **发布时间**: 预计 iPhone 17 系列将于 2025 年 9 月首次亮相，Apple 有望在 2025 年 9 月 8 日那一周举行年度 iPhone 发布会。
*   **iPhone 17 Pro 特性**: 传闻 iPhone 17 Pro 型号将采用铝制边框（而非 iPhone 15 Pro 和 iPhone 16 Pro 的钛金属边框），并可能具备 8 倍变焦和专业的相机应用。

items.translated_title: iOS 18.6 和 macOS Sequoia 15.6 修复 Chrome 零日攻击
items.content:
The iOS 18.6, iPadOS 18.6, and macOS Sequoia 15.6 updates that Apple released yesterday address a major zero-day attack that targeted Chrome users, according to Bleeping Computer.


Apple says that CVE-2025-6558 was a vulnerability in open source code that also affected Apple software. The flaw could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code using HTML pages created for that purpose, escaping Chrome's sandboxing. Google patched the issue on July 15, and said that it had been actively exploited.

In Safari, Apple said that the issue could cause unexpected crashing, but it wasn't known to have been used in attacks against Safari users.

Google hasn't offered up technical details on how the exploit worked, and the company said that additional information would be restricted until the majority of users have updated their devices. Chrome users who have not installed the latest version of Chrome should do so.
This article, "iOS 18.6 and macOS Sequoia 15.6 Address Chrome Zero-Day Attack" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 评测：Anker Prime Thunderbolt 5 扩展坞，紧凑设计与14个端口的结合 (原标题: Review: Anker Prime Thunderbolt 5 Dock Pairs Compact Design With 14 Ports)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## Anker Prime Thunderbolt 5 扩展坞评测

### 概述
Anker Prime TB5 扩展坞是Anker推出的一款14端口Thunderbolt 5扩展坞，专为支持Apple最新M4 Pro和M4 Max芯片的Thunderbolt 5 Mac设计。它旨在扩展可用端口数量，并提供Apple已停用的传统端口（如USB-A）。Thunderbolt 5技术提供80Gb/s的对称数据传输速度，在连接显示器时带宽可提升至120Gb/s，从而在连接更多设备时避免带宽限制。

![Anker Prime Thunderbolt 扩展坞](https://images.macrumors.com/t/i2eXqdQbJwvUjdwiBgb90TKPSZs=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/anker-prime-thunderbolt-dock.jpg?lossy)

### 设计
*   **紧凑与集成电源：** Anker Prime TB5 扩展坞采用独特的方形设计，尺寸紧凑（4.6 x 4.6 x 3 英寸），将232W电源集成在内部，无需笨重的外部电源适配器，仅需一根细线连接电源插座，另一根线连接Mac。
*   **端口布局：** 端口分布在三个侧面，常用端口（如USB-C、USB-A、耳机插孔）位于正面，方便访问；不常用端口（如以太网、HDMI）位于背面，布局合理。
*   **散热：** 铝制外壳内置风扇，有效散热，运行时温度极低，几乎不发热。风扇噪音约为32分贝，属于轻微可闻但通常不干扰的水平。
*   **外观：** 灰色铝制，颜色介于深空黑和银色之间。顶部有蓝色LED指示灯，可关闭。

![Anker Prime 主视图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/LBbRUXh9sksknq4U_VOQR2jiR6I=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/anker-prime-main.jpg?lossy)
![Anker Prime 灯光](https://images.macrumors.com/t/0pxQFilhLC6OPmMIFV-ccGFNUqc=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/anker-prime-light.jpg?lossy)

### 端口详情
*   **正面：**
    *   1个耳机插孔
    *   2个USB-C端口（总计45W充电功率，支持数据传输，可为MacBook Air、iPad、iPhone等设备充电）
    *   1个USB-A端口

![Anker Prime 正面端口](https://images.macrumors.com/t/H19jApHJ3fTzyyEfYTn8XRx_cSE=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/anker-prime-1.jpg?lossy)
*   **左侧：**
    *   1个SD卡槽
    *   1个microSD卡槽（UHS-1，速度限制104MB/s）

![Anker Prime 侧面端口](https://images.macrumors.com/t/30q1WNDjEphHowIvxdS43G75z1o=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/anker-prime-2.jpg?lossy)
*   **背面：**
    *   1个AC电源输入
    *   1个上行Thunderbolt 5端口（连接Mac，最高140W充电）
    *   2个下行Thunderbolt 5端口（15W总线供电，用于SSD等Thunderbolt/USB-C配件）
    *   2个10Gb/s USB-A端口
    *   1个2.5Gb/s以太网端口（非10GbE）
    *   1个HDMI 2.1端口
    *   1个DisplayPort 2.1端口（HDMI和DisplayPort不能同时使用）

### 显示器支持
*   支持最多两台6K显示器@60Hz（如两台Pro Display XDR或Studio Display）。
*   Mac通过单个Thunderbolt 5端口最多支持两台显示器；PC可支持三台。
*   HDMI和DisplayPort不能同时使用，这意味着可选择：两台显示器通过TB5端口连接，或一台通过TB5另一台通过HDMI/DP连接。
*   兼容旧款Mac（M1、M2、M3 Pro/Max，以及所有标准M4机器），在Thunderbolt 4模式下仍支持双6K 60Hz显示器。
*   注意：不支持双5K Thunderbolt 3显示器或5K TB3与TB4显示器组合的屏幕镜像模式。

![Anker Prime 桌面使用](https://images.macrumors.com/t/KaBFiooHwKjXZqDV4OYh6A5xZY=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/anker-prime-desk.jpg?lossy)

### SSD速度测试
与OWC Thunderbolt 5 SSD配合M4 Pro MacBook Pro测试显示，通过扩展坞的写入速度约4,675MB/s，读取速度约5,140MB/s。虽然略低于直接连接Mac（写入约5,250MB/s，读取约5,350MB/s），但日常使用中传输速度仍非常快（例如，传输50GB照片约20秒）。

### 软件
Anker提供Dock Manager软件，用于固件更新和设置调整（如关闭指示灯）。

### 总结
Anker Prime是一款价格适中（400美元）、设计紧凑、端口丰富的Thunderbolt 5扩展坞，适合大多数普通用户。对于拥有Thunderbolt 5 Mac的用户，它能很好地支持显示器、SSD和其他外设。即使是Thunderbolt 4 Mac用户，也可将其作为未来升级Thunderbolt 5的“前瞻性”选择。然而，它不建议专业用户或对极致性能和连接性有高要求者，因为它缺乏10GbE、UHS-II支持，且USB-C/Thunderbolt端口数量可能不足。

### 购买信息
Anker Prime TB5 扩展坞可在Anker官网或亚马逊购买，售价400美元。
items.shortSummary: Anker Prime Thunderbolt 5 扩展坞是一款紧凑型14端口设备，内置电源，支持双6K显示器和高达140W的Mac充电。它提供多种USB、SD卡、以太网和显示端口，并兼容Thunderbolt 5和4 Mac。尽管SSD速度略低于直连，且缺乏10GbE和UHS-II等专业功能，但其设计和端口配置使其成为大多数日常用户的理想选择，售价400美元。
items.translated_title: 评测：Anker Prime Thunderbolt 5 扩展坞，紧凑设计与14个端口的结合
items.content:
Apple added Thunderbolt 5 connectivity to its latest M4 Pro and M4 Max machines, and companies are starting to launch Thunderbolt 5 docks compatible with Apple's Thunderbolt 5 Macs. Earlier this year, Anker came out with the Anker Prime TB5 Docking Station, a 14-port dock with a unique design and a high-end feature set.


Docks are useful because they expand the available number of ports that you can use at one time, and add legacy ports like USB-A that Apple has discontinued. Thunderbolt 5 provides 80Gb/s symmetric data, which is double that of Thunderbolt 4, plus there is a bandwidth boost option up to 120Gb/s when displays are connected. You're able to connect more without running into bandwidth limits.

Design


The Anker Prime TB5 Docking Station is probably my favorite dock I've used to date thanks to the design. It's surprisingly compact for a 14-port dock, with a square shape that spreads the ports across three of the sides.


The best part about the Anker Prime is the lack of a bulky external power supply. The 232W power supply is in the cube, so there's just a slim cable that needs to be plugged into an outlet, and then a cable to connect the dock to a Mac. The dock comes with both of the cables, and I do have a minor cable complaint. At $400, I wish the cables that came along with the dock were nicer, perhaps with a braided design.

I like the square form factor because it doesn't take up much space on my desk, and it's nice not to have to deal with positioning a bulky power supply. I tuck my cables inside boxes that keep them out of sight and out of my cat's mouth, and it's always a hassle trying to get a power supply and multiple cables to fit.

The Anker Prime has a power button on the front, a couple of easy access USB-C and USB-A ports for charging devices, and a headphone jack. Other ports are on the back and the sides, and I think the port layout is well designed. The ports I need to access often are at the front or the side, while things I don't need as frequently, like Ethernet or HDMI, are at the back. I do wish at least one of the downstream TB5 ports was at the front though.

The enclosure includes a fan, and it's made from aluminum for heat dissipation. I can hear the fan, but it's a subtle sound that I'm not sure would register with other noises in the room. I'm sound sensitive and it does bother me because the dock is right by my displays, but I can't hear it listening to music, wearing AirPods, watching TV, or when the AC is on. A decibel measuring app suggests that it is around 32 decibels, which would be around whisper level.

Size-wise, the Anker Prime is 4.6 by 4.6, and it's three inches tall. If you have a Mac mini, it's around that size, but not quite as wide, and it's about an inch taller. The color is a gray aluminum. It's not as dark as the Space Black aluminum of the M4 MacBook Pro models, nor is it as light as the silver aluminum, so it's kind of an in-between shade.

There's blue LED lighting around the top of the dock when it's powered on and in use. The light isn't bright enough to be bothersome, and it can be turned off by pressing the power button.


With the fan, the enclosure doesn't get hot. It barely feels warm at all, which is a departure from docks that rely on heat dissipation without active fan cooling. I'd be surprised if the Anker Prime could overheat, given how cool it runs with multiple peripherals plugged in. Compared to other docks like the CalDigit TS5 Plus, it's significantly cooler.

Ports


At the front of the dock, there's a headphone jack, two USB-C ports, and a USB-A port. The USB-C ports offer a combined 45W of power for charging other devices. 45W is enough to charge a MacBook Air, or an iPad and an iPhone at full speed. One port will get the full 45W when just one device is plugged in. With two ports in use, the split is 30W to the first port and 15W to the second port.


The two front USB-C ports also support data transfer, but displays need to be connected at the back. The front ports offer power to accessories even when a Mac isn't plugged in, which is convenient.

There are no ports on the right side, but there is a "Prime" logo. The left side has an SD card slot and a microSD card slot (labeled TF). The card slots are UHS-1 and limited to 104MB/s, so photographers won't get UHS-II transfer speeds.


The majority of the ports are at the back. There's an AC-in for the plug, an upstream Thunderbolt 5 port for connecting the Anker Prime to a Mac (with up to 140W charging), and two downstream Thunderbolt 5 ports with 15W bus power for SSDs and other Thunderbolt/USB-C accessories. Earlier Macs were limited to 100W charging unless MagSafe was used, but that is not a limitation on Thunderbolt 5 Macs.

There are two additional 10Gb/s USB-A ports, a 2.5Gb/s Ethernet port, an HDMI 2.1 port, and a DisplayPort 2.1 port. With the HDMI and DisplayPort, only one can be used at a time, so keep that in mind when you're dock shopping.

I don't use an Ethernet port, but it is disappointing that the Anker Prime doesn't have a 10Gb Ethernet port for those who need or want that connectivity.

Displays


Anker says that the Anker Prime supports up to two 6K displays at 60Hz, so you can run two Pro Display XDR displays, two Studio Displays, or any other combination of 6K/5K/4K displays, depending on the resolution (only one 4K display at 240Hz is supported on the Mac). On PCs, the Anker Prime supports three total displays, but Macs have a two display limit over a single Thunderbolt 5 port.


The M4 Max chip supports up to two 8K displays at 60Hz, according to Apple, while the M4 Pro supports one 8K display at 60Hz. Anker does not list 8K display support for the Mac and I don't have 8K displays to test, but it should work.

Anker says that the HDMI and DisplayPort ports can't be used together, which means two displays can be connected through the Thunderbolt 5 ports, or one can be connected using TB5 and the other can be connected via HDMI or DisplayPort, leaving a Thunderbolt port free for an SSD or other accessory.

I used an M4 Pro MacBook Pro with the Anker Prime, and I tested it with the 5K Studio Display over Thunderbolt and a 4K 144Hz display from Samsung that I connected via DisplayPort. I had no problems with connectivity over several days of testing and with various combinations of accessories plugged in. The displays and the ports worked as intended.

Though this is a Thunderbolt 5 dock, it is backwards compatible with earlier versions of Thunderbolt, which means it is compatible with older Macs. M1, M2, and M3 Pro and Max machines and all standard M4 machines with Thunderbolt 4 chips support dual 6K 60Hz displays when paired with the Anker Prime.

The aforementioned two display setup also ran fine on an M1 Max ‌MacBook Pro‌. Compared to Thunderbolt 4, Thunderbolt 5 has more total bandwidth for displays and accessories, so you'll need a Thunderbolt 5 machine for the best performance and to max out the capabilities of the dock.

There is some fine print with the Anker Prime, which you're going to want to read if you have a 5K Thunderbolt 3 display. Dual 5K Thunderbolt 3 displays or a combination of a 5K display and Thunderbolt 4 display won't work with screen mirroring mode.

SSD Speed Tests


I used a Thunderbolt 5 SSD from OWC with the M4 Pro ‌MacBook Pro‌ and the Anker Prime. The SSD promises 6,000MB/s speeds, but I didn't quite hit that. Write speeds with the Anker Prime maxed out at about 4,675MB/s, while read speeds were around 5,140MB/s. When plugged directly into the Thunderbolt 5 port of the M4 Pro ‌MacBook Pro‌, the SSD's write speeds were up to 5,250MB/s and read speeds were at 5,350MB/s. Real world speeds can vary based on the load a Mac is under, so actual transfer speeds vary.

Write speeds were consistently slightly lower, but Thunderbolt 5 transfer speeds are quick enough that it didn't bother me in day-to-day use. Transferring 50GB of photos took around 20 seconds, which is quick enough for my use.

Software


Anker has Dock Manager software that can be used to deliver firmware updates to the Anker Prime, or to tweak dock settings like disabling the light.

Bottom Line


The Anker Prime is one of the more affordable Thunderbolt 5 docks on the market, and its compact design, port array, and features make it ideal for the average user. If you have a Thunderbolt 5 Mac and want to get a dock that'll let you run displays, plug in SSDs, and use other peripherals, I don't think you'll regret the Anker Prime.

If you don't have a Thunderbolt 5 Mac, it might still be worth picking up. It's compatible with Thunderbolt 4, and it operates the same way a Thunderbolt 4 dock would, but you also have the future proofing for Thunderbolt 5 when it's time to upgrade.

While I think the dock has the right ports for most people, this isn't the dock I'd recommend for professional use or for those who want the best performance and connectivity. It's limited to 2.5GbE, there isn't UHS-II support, and there are only two USB-C ports in addition to the two Thunderbolt ports, which might not be enough for some users.

How to Buy


The Anker Prime TB5 Docking Station can be purchased from the Anker website or from Amazon for $400.

Note: Anker provided MacRumors with an Anker Prime for the purpose of this review. No other compensation was received.
Tag: Anker

This article, "Review: Anker Prime Thunderbolt 5 Dock Pairs Compact Design With 14 Ports" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 哎呀：苹果最新广告牌惊现生殖器图案 (原标题: Oops: Apple's Latest Billboard Features Phallic Design)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果广告牌争议：设计被指形似生殖器

苹果公司最新推出的“Shot on iPhone, Drawn on iPad”系列广告牌在迈阿密引发了争议。一块结合了iPhone摄影和iPad绘画的广告牌，因其设计被Reddit用户和《迈阿密新时报》指出带有明显的生殖器图案。

### 争议焦点

该广告牌的设计特点是：
*   一张鲨鱼的照片，搭配一个卡通潜水员。
*   由于透视效果，卡通潜水员的手指显得异常巨大。
*   《迈阿密新时报》因此质疑：“苹果是否在I-95高速公路上放置了一个巨大的生殖器符号？”

### 广告牌详情

*   **位置与尺寸**：这块广告牌位于迈阿密的I-95高速公路上方，长度约15英尺，因此引起了驾车者的注意。
*   **内容可见性**：近距离观看时，鲨鱼、潜水员和章鱼的组合清晰可见。然而，从远处看，广告牌上的内容则难以辨认。
*   **系列背景**：该卡通图案是苹果“Shot on iPhone, Drawn on iPad”系列的一部分，该系列展示了八位艺术家的创意作品。

### 苹果的回应

该广告牌已展示超过一周，并且其设计也已在Instagram上分享。这表明苹果公司可能计划对那些在画作中看到“不仅仅是简单潜水员”的人群的看法不予理会。

![苹果广告牌](https://images.macrumors.com/t/MFWcVHarXLm78gdb3lWEMNXoSVM=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/apple-billboard.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果在迈阿密的新“Shot on iPhone, Drawn on iPad”广告牌引发争议。广告牌上的卡通潜水员手指因透视效果显得巨大，被Reddit用户和当地媒体指出形似生殖器。这块约15英尺长的广告牌位于I-95高速公路旁，已展示一周多。尽管引发关注，苹果似乎选择对此争议不予回应。
items.translated_title: 哎呀：苹果最新广告牌惊现生殖器图案
items.content:
Apple has a new 'Shot on iPhone' billboard design that combines ‌iPhone‌ photography with iPad sketches, but as one Reddit user noticed, the result is decidedly phallic.


The billboard was shared on the Miami subreddit earlier this month, and highlighted by the Miami New Times earlier today. The design features a photo of a shark along with a cartoon scuba diver that has an oversized finger because of the perspective, leading the Miami New Times to wonder "Did Apple Put a Giant Phallic Symbol on I-95?"

The billboard is above Miami's I-95 freeway, and it is around 15 feet in length, so it hasn't escaped the notice of motorists. The cartoon is part of Apple's Shot on iPhone, Drawn on iPad series that features creations from eight artists. Up close, the shark, scuba diver, and octopus combo are clear, but it's a little hard to tell what's going on from further away.

Apple's billboard has been up for over a week, plus the design has been shared on Instagram, so Apple may be planning to ignore those who see more than a simple scuba diver in the drawing.
Tag: Apple Ads

items.title: 凯撒宫Apple Store下月将暂时关闭 (原标题: Apple Store in Caesars Palace Temporarily Closing Next Month)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 凯撒宫Apple Store临时关闭详情

苹果公司宣布，其位于拉斯维加斯凯撒宫The Forum Shops的Apple Store将于2025年8月9日至8月31日期间暂时关闭。

*   **地点**: 该店位于内华达州拉斯维加斯大道上著名的豪华酒店和赌场度假村凯撒宫内的The Forum Shops购物中心。
*   **关闭时间**: 2025年8月9日至8月31日。
*   **关闭性质**: 临时关闭。
*   **关闭原因**: 苹果公司网站未提供具体原因，但预计不会有任何重大变动。
*   **替代方案**: 在该店关闭期间，苹果建议顾客前往其位于拉斯维加斯大道以北仅一英里处的Fashion Show Apple Store。

![凯撒宫The Forum Shops Apple Store](https://images.macrumors.com/t/L7inlcGtBQD6oZ0_hDS-Qezrpm8=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Apple-Store-Caesars-Palace-The-Forum-Shops.jpeg?lossy)

### 全球Apple Store动态

2025年8月9日对于全球的Apple Store来说将是重要的一天：

*   除了拉斯维加斯The Forum Shops店的临时关闭外，英国布里斯托尔（Apple Bristol）和中国帕克兰（Apple Parkland）的Apple Store也将于同日永久关闭。
*   同时，匹兹堡沙迪赛德（Apple Shadyside）的Apple Store也将于当天迁至核桃街的新址并重新开业。

items.content:
Apple today announced that its store at The Forum Shops in the Las Vegas area will be temporarily closed between August 9 and August 31.


Apple's website does not provide a reason for the closure. We do not expect any major changes.

The Forum Shops is a shopping mall inside Caesars Palace, the famous luxury hotel and casino resort located on the Las Vegas Strip in Nevada.

While its store at The Forum Shops is closed, Apple says customers can visit its Fashion Show store, which is located just one mile further north on the Las Vegas Strip.

August 9 is shaping up to be an eventful day for Apple Stores. In addition to Apple The Forum Shops temporarily closing, Apple Bristol in England and Apple Parkland in China will be permanently closing on that day. It is also the same day that Apple Shadyside in Pittsburgh will be opening in a new location on Walnut Street.

items.title: 这30家航空公司提供iPhone功能，帮助您找回丢失的行李 (原标题: These 30 Airlines Offer iPhone Feature That Helps Find Your Lost Bags)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# iOS 18.2 新功能：协助找回丢失行李

iOS 18.2 于去年12月发布，其“查找”应用中新增了一项功能，允许用户暂时与他人（包括参与此功能的航空公司员工）共享配备AirTag物品的位置。这意味着，如果您的行李中放置了AirTag，当行李在机场丢失或延误时，航空公司可以更好地协助您找回。

![iOS 18 2 Share Item Location](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Dmd7xRN08EUorbQ1TBjwozycySw=/400x0/article-new/2024/11/iOS-18-2-Share-Item-Location.jpg?lossy)

## 功能兼容性与操作方式

*   **兼容性：** 此功能不仅适用于AirTag，还支持其他兼容Apple“查找”网络的物品追踪器，例如Chipolo和Pebblebee销售的产品。
*   **操作方式：** 运行iOS 18.2、iPadOS 18.2和macOS Sequoia 15.2或更高版本的iPhone、iPad和Mac用户可以在“查找”应用中生成一个“共享物品位置”链接。
*   **共享视图：** 任何获得此链接的人都可以通过网页查看物品在地图上的位置，该页面会自动更新物品的最新已知位置。

![Apple Share Item Location iPhone iPad Mac](https://images.macrumors.com/t/yhOmuupuIG7b23z1M3_pzqw_rV4=/400x0/article-new/2024/11/Apple-Share-Item-Location-iPhone-iPad-Mac.jpg?lossy)

## 位置共享的持续时间

物品位置共享会在用户找回物品后立即停止，或者在七天后自动过期。

## 支持此功能的航空公司列表

以下是已知在其客户服务流程中支持此功能的航空公司，沙特航空是最新加入的：

items.content:
iOS 18.2 was released in December with a new feature in the Find My app that allows you to temporarily share the location of an AirTag-equipped item with others, including employees at participating airlines. This way, if you have put AirTags inside your bags, the airline can better help you find them in the event they are lost or delayed at the airport.


The feature also works with other item trackers that support Apple's Find My network, such as those sold by Chipolo and Pebblebee.

iPhone, iPad, and Mac users running iOS 18.2, iPadOS 18.2, and macOS Sequoia 15.2 or later can generate a "Share Item Location" link in the Find My app. Anyone they share the link with can then view a web page with a location of the item on a map. The page will automatically update with the item's latest known location.


The item's location stops being shared "as soon as a user is reunited with their item," or automatically expires after seven days.

Below, we have listed airlines that support the feature as part of their customer service processes, with the latest one being Saudia.
  • AJet

items.title: 苹果有望收购另一处硅谷园区 (原标题: Apple Expected to Buy Another Silicon Valley Campus)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
## 苹果有望收购另一处硅谷园区

苹果公司正计划在加利福尼亚州硅谷收购另一处园区，这使得其今年的房产购买总额接近10亿美元。此次收购是苹果近期一系列重大房地产投资的延续，旨在巩固其在硅谷的业务布局。

### Mathilda Campus 收购详情

*   **地点与构成：** 苹果将从Kilroy Realty Corporation手中收购Mathilda Campus，该园区由位于北马蒂尔达大道505-599号和西莫德大道605号的四栋建筑组成。
*   **规模：** 该场地包含约663,000平方英尺的办公空间。
*   **现有租赁：** 苹果目前已租赁其中超过580,000平方英尺，约占该综合体的88%。
*   **交易预计完成时间：** 该交易预计将于2025年第三季度完成，按每平方英尺550美元的价格计算。
*   **信息来源：** Kilroy在其第二季度财报中披露了出售“硅谷一处四栋建筑园区”的合同，但未指明买方。《旧金山纪事报》通过两名直接知情人士确认买方为苹果公司，且该物业正是Mathilda Campus。

### 近期其他重要收购

此次Mathilda Campus的收购是苹果近几个月来第三笔重大房地产交易：

*   **Cupertino Gateway：** 2025年6月，苹果以1.669亿美元完成了对Cupertino Gateway的收购。这是一个包含三栋建筑的综合体，位于北坦陶大道10200号，毗邻其苹果公园（Apple Park）总部。
*   **相邻办公物业：** 2025年7月，苹果以3.5亿美元收购了位于北马蒂尔达大道615号和625号的两处相邻办公物业，这些物业紧邻Mathilda Campus。
*   **共同点：** 与Mathilda Campus类似，苹果此前也租赁并使用了这些物业的大部分空间。

### 总投资与战略意义

*   **总金额：** 在短短几周内，这三笔交易的总支出约为8.82亿美元。
*   **地理位置：** 所有三处物业均位于距离苹果公园（Apple Park）数英里之内，这表明苹果正在其核心总部附近集中和扩展其办公空间。

![apple park at night 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/b0GqOlXR9z4qqOYqpHlNmRYryn8=/400x0/article-new/2022/05/apple-park-at-night-1.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果公司计划收购硅谷的Mathilda Campus，这是其今年近10亿美元房产投资的一部分。该园区约66.3万平方英尺，苹果已租赁其中88%。交易预计2025年第三季度完成，单价每平方英尺550美元。此前，苹果已斥资约5.17亿美元收购了Cupertino Gateway和Mathilda Campus附近的物业。所有新购地点均靠近苹果公园，显示其持续扩张策略。
items.translated_title: 苹果有望收购另一处硅谷园区
items.content:
Apple is set to purchase another campus in Silicon Valley, California, amid almost $1 billion of property purchases this year.


According to The San Francisco Chronicle, Apple is purchasing the four-building Mathilda Campus, located at 505–599 North Mathilda Avenue and 605 West Maude Avenue, from Kilroy Realty Corporation. The site comprises approximately 663,000 square feet of office space, of which Apple already leases over 580,000 square feet, which is roughly 88% of the complex. The sale is expected to close in the third quarter of 2025 at a rate of $550 per square foot.

Kilroy disclosed in its second-quarter earnings report that it is under contract to sell a "four building campus in Silicon Valley" but did not specify the buyer. Two individuals with direct knowledge of the transaction confirmed to The San Francisco Chronicle that the buyer is Apple and that the property in question is the Mathilda Campus.

The Mathilda Campus purchase follows two other significant acquisitions by Apple in recent months. In June, Apple finalized the $166.9 million purchase of Cupertino Gateway, a three-building complex at 10200 North Tantau Avenue, adjacent to its Apple Park headquarters. Then, in July, the company acquired two neighboring office properties at 615 and 625 North Mathilda Avenue, directly adjacent to the Mathilda Campus, for $350 million. Like the Mathilda Campus, Apple had previously leased and occupied the majority of those properties.

Combined, these three transactions amount to a total outlay of approximately $882 million within a span of several weeks. All three sites are located within a few miles of ‌Apple Park‌.
